channel.title: Pkp
channel.description: ONLY when you kill someone your supposed to get PKP but, for some reason you get them dying at Kq, Kbd, Jad PVM and even duel arena could anyone help me fix? I got a team viewer!

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:419723”]PlayerAssistant.java in applyDead method.

If you get pk points from dying, make it this.

instead of

Depending on which thing you put it under, depends on where you get the pk point for killing the player.[/quote]

item.title: Pkp

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

PlayerAssistant.java in applyDead method.

If you get pk points from dying, make it this.

instead of

Depending on which thing you put it under, depends on where you get the pk point for killing the player.

item.title: Pkp
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

baddy351:

Go to giveLife or applyDead void (forget which), for apply dead delete where it adds, and for stuff like duel arena, or funpk. just add !c.inFunPk or !c.InDuel

Okay i sortof get it but, i dont know what to add or erase so if you got a teamviewer cud you help?
